mapper.select: SELECT survey_id, s_seq, st_mobile, answer, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id from sresult
mapper.update: MERGE INTO sresult USING dual on(survey_id = :1 and s_seq = :2 and st_mobile = :3) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET answer = :4 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( survey_id, s_seq, st_mobile, answer ) VALUES ( :1, :2, :3, :4 )

insert into sresult ( survey_id, s_seq, st_mobile, answer, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( :1, :2, :3, :4, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :5, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :6 )
update sresult set answer =:1, up_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), up_user_id =:2 where survey_id=:3 and s_seq=:4 and st_mobile=:5
delete from sresult where survey_id = :1 and s_seq= :2 and st_mobile=:3
